title: Textile, 1919
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic threads
Technique: cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a plain compound foundation (velvet)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 57 x 76 cm (22 7/16 x 29 15/16 in.)
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Black velvet ground with an allover design of deeply looping lines in metallic gold. Four different colors of metallics – blue, orange, violet and green – in the ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1919.
1919. Medium: silk and metallic threads
